definition: to take part in/to participate/to join/to attend/to counsel/unequal/varied/irregular/uneven/not uniform/abbr. for 參議院|参议院 Senate, Upper House

sentences.english: We think we're all ready to implement universal suffrage in 2012.
sentences.chinese: 我們認爲到2012年應有全面的民主參政權。

sentences.english: The United States granted the franchise to women in 1920.
sentences.chinese: 美國於1920年給婦女以參政權。

sentences.english: Readers realize the value of library, they have the right to participate in the political affairs.
sentences.chinese: 讀者作爲圖書館的真正主人擁有“參政權”。

sentences.english: It has been 60 years since Japanese women have got the suffrage.
sentences.chinese: 日本婦女自獲得參政權以來，已有近60年的歷史。

sentences.english: Womens political rights are one of the heatedly discussed issues in various related fields.
sentences.chinese: 婦女參政權是社會各界關注的熱點問題之一。

sentences.english: But I must say I have a great admiration for the suffragettes.
sentences.chinese: 我必須說我很羨慕婦女參政權論者。
現在婦女也有參政權了。
